formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: For deformed bars in compression, the required development length is LaTeX: l_{dc} = \psi_s \cdot \max\!\Bigg( \;0.02\,\frac{f_y}{\lambda \sqrt{f'_c}}\,d_b,\; 0.0003\,f_y\,d_b,\; 8\,d_b \;\Bigg) where Ïˆ_s = 0.75 for bars enclosed by qualifying spirals, otherwise 1.00. Units consistent: f'y, f'c in psi for the constants shown; when using SI (MPa, mm), the calculator converts internally.

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
